title: How can we get GREY WARWRICK skin?
body: As a 2 year Ocean player, I am glad to see the rework of Warwrick {{champion:19}} which is my favorite champion. And I asked my friend to purchase the bundle skin even I was abroad. The result is NO GREY skin, the most skin I wanted since I saw the League of Legends came out. Everyone wants to owns all skins for their  most love champion, same as I. However when I turned to start a new account in Oceania, and it is playable just after the ONLY method Referral System was shut down. Every Warwrick player needs an explain.Times gone, it is always a pity every time when I chose Warwrick to take my to win but saw the Block of this Grey skin, every time when I go to the store, there is only "Not available" Just cannot wait for more, cause I do not know how long I can insist.

replies.body: Grey Warwick, similar to Medieval Twitch, is no longer able to be obtained. This skin was previously awarded to individuals who utilized the Refer-A-Friend system and were able to hit specific milestones. The RAF system was retired a while ago, and these skins were retired with it. However, Riot did make a comment that indicated that these skins may return in the future as a reward for another system, but there have been no updates since then.
